abstract: Federal Communications Commission approves overhaul of fund that subsidizes rural telephone service, turning it into one meant to offer broadband service to millions of Americans who lack high-speed connections.
snippet: The fund that subsidizes rural telephone service will be turned into one that offers service to those who lack high-speed Internet connections.
lead_paragraph: The fund that subsidizes rural telephone service will be turned into one that offers service to those who lack high-speed Internet connections.

headline.seo: F.C.C. Overhauls Fund for Broadband Service
